EnablingAuthority.XRefExternal: PUBLIC SERVICE REARRANGEMENT AND TRANSFER OF DUTIES ACT

Identification.LongTitle: Order Amalgamating and Combining the Department of International Trade and the Department of Foreign Affairs and International Trade under the Minister and the Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: pursuant to paragraph 2(a)a of the Public Service Rearrangement and Transfer of Duties Act, transfers

Provision.Label: (i)
Provision.Text: from the Department of International Trade to the Department of Foreign Affairs and International Trade the control and supervision of all of the portions of the federal public administration within the Department of International Trade, and

Provision.Label: (ii)
Provision.Text: from the Minister for International Trade to the Minister of Foreign Affairs the powers, duties and functions received by the Minister for International Trade under paragraph (b) of Order in Council P.C. 2003-2049 of December 12, 2003, and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: pursuant to paragraph 2(b) of the Public Service Rearrangement and Transfer of Duties Act, amalgamates and combines the Department of International Trade and the Department of Foreign Affairs and International Trade under the Minister of Foreign Affairs and the Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs,
